Roadmap

Version 1.4

User modes (vacations) to support automatic delegation of activities

Version 1.3

Activities can trigger external REST-based web services

Version 1.2

Shared data workspace
Email notifications receive a direct link to the process
NOW

Version 1.1

Files from the file repository can now be imported into processes
The commentaries are now more visible due to augmented font size
Fix the file download link to pdf files contained in the file repository
